title: Knife, ca. 1744
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Sabre-shaped blade, plain bolster. Banded silver ferrule with scalloped edge. Pistol-shaped white porcelain handle with dark blue floral and scrolled decoration.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1744.
ca. 1744. steel, silver, porcelain. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-228.
